data_properties.description: The numeric or sequential order of a person's residences or locations over their lifetime, used to reconstruct the sequence of where a person has lived.

usage_guideline.description: Assign an explicit sequence or order number to each residence or location associated with a Person to trace life trajectory chronologically.
usage_guideline.constraints: Unique per person and timeline; lower numbers represent earlier residences. Should be used in conjunction with properties linking Person and Location.

data_properties.name: hasAnnotationDate
data_properties.description: Specifies the date (or date-time) when a particular annotation or commentary was made or assigned to a life event or period.

usage_guideline.description: Record the timestamp or date when an annotation or code was created/applied, supporting audit trails and analytical sequencing.
usage_guideline.constraints: Should be included wherever annotation provenance is relevant; only one annotation date per annotation instance.

data_properties.name: hasProficiencyLevel
data_properties.description: Denotes the level or degree of proficiency a person has in a specific language, such as native, fluent, conversational, or basic.

usage_guideline.description: Use standardized proficiency levels or controlled vocabulary where possible.
usage_guideline.constraints: One proficiency level per LanguageProficiency instance; use recognized frameworks if available (e.g., CEFR, ACTFL).

data_properties.name: hasLanguageContext
data_properties.description: Adds contextual information about how or why a person uses or knows a language—such as familial, cultural, educational, or community background.

usage_guideline.description: Record cultural, familial, or situational context of language use/proficiency.
usage_guideline.constraints: Use concise explanations; one context per LanguageProficiency instance, as relevant.

data_properties.name: affiliationPeriod
data_properties.description: Specifies the period during which a ReligiousAffiliation or LanguageUseContext was held or relevant to a person.

usage_guideline.description: Use ISO 8601 intervals or clear narrative periods to indicate the timespan of an affiliation or language use context.
usage_guideline.constraints: One period per instance; necessary for histories with multiple changing affiliations or contexts.

data_properties.name: hasReligion
data_properties.description: Indicates the religion or spiritual tradition associated with a ReligiousAffiliation.

usage_guideline.description: Enter the recognized name of the religion, denomination, or spiritual tradition.
usage_guideline.constraints: Use a controlled list of religion names or codes when possible; one value per ReligiousAffiliation.

data_properties.name: contextType
data_properties.description: Specifies the type or nature of a LanguageUseContext (e.g., home, work, education, migration).

usage_guideline.description: Use controlled vocabulary or concise terms describing the domain of language use.
usage_guideline.constraints: Each LanguageUseContext instance should have exactly one context type.

data_properties.name: segmentLabel
data_properties.description: A label or descriptor for a specific segment of an individual's life history data, such as childhood, early career, or migration period.

usage_guideline.description: Use to assign a human-readable or analytical label to each segment/life phase when distinguishing privacy or access restrictions.
usage_guideline.constraints: One label per LifePhase; choose meaningful, short descriptors.

data_properties.name: aliasPeriod
data_properties.description: Indicates the date or period during which a specific Alias was in use by an individual.

usage_guideline.description: Document the time frame in which an alias was used, using ISO 8601 intervals or narrative period descriptions.
usage_guideline.constraints: One period per alias instance. Leave blank if duration is unknown.

data_properties.name: preferredNamePeriod
data_properties.description: Indicates the date or period during which a specific PreferredName was actively used by an individual.

usage_guideline.description: Record the relevant period for preferred name usage, using ISO format or clear text. Supports histories where an individual's preferred name changed over time.
usage_guideline.constraints: One period per PreferredName instance; period may overlap with legal/alias names.

data_properties.name: contextOfNameUse
data_properties.description: Describes the context in which a particular PreferredName or Alias is/was used, such as professional, community, or digital environment.

usage_guideline.description: Specify the principal context (e.g., workplace, academic, online) where the name is/was relevant. Useful for distinguishing when different names are used in distinct spheres.
usage_guideline.constraints: Use concise terms; one context per name instance. May be omitted if unambiguous.

data_properties.name: hasArtifactType
data_properties.description: Specifies the type of multimedia artifact (e.g., photograph, video, audio) being referenced.

usage_guideline.description: Use controlled vocabulary terms such as 'photograph', 'video', or 'audio' to categorize multimedia artifacts by media type.
usage_guideline.constraints: One type per artifact instance; refer to a recognized list of media types when possible.

data_properties.name: hasInstitutionCountry
data_properties.description: Indicates the country in which an educational institution conferring a degree, certification, diploma, or license is located.

usage_guideline.description: Specify the country as a controlled value (such as ISO country code or full country name).
usage_guideline.constraints: Each institution instance should have one associated country; use recognized country codes or names.

data_properties.name: hasLicenseNumber
data_properties.description: Records the identifier, number, or code assigned to a license granted to an individual.

usage_guideline.description: Record the exact license number or identifier as it appears on the official document.
usage_guideline.constraints: One value per license instance; sensitive and may require privacy protection.

data_properties.name: licenseType
data_properties.description: Specifies the type or category of the license (e.g., driver's license, teaching license, professional certification).

usage_guideline.description: Define the nature or class of the license using a standard controlled vocabulary.
usage_guideline.constraints: One type per license instance; controlled terms preferred.

data_properties.name: licensePeriod
data_properties.description: Indicates the date or period during which a particular license was valid for an individual.

usage_guideline.description: Record the period of validity for the license using ISO 8601 intervals or a clear text date range.
usage_guideline.constraints: One period per license; duration should reflect actual validity dates whenever possible.

data_properties.name: achievementContext
data_properties.description: Describes the context, circumstance, or environment in which an informal achievement or recognition was accomplished or recorded.

usage_guideline.description: Record a concise contextual description specifying how or why the achievement occurred (e.g., 'community service', 'peer recognition', 'informal innovation').
usage_guideline.constraints: One context per informal achievement; use controlled terms where appropriate.

data_properties.name: recognitionContext
data_properties.description: Specifies the context or situation in which a formal award or recognition was conferred, such as the specific event, competition, or institutional framework.

usage_guideline.description: Capture the awarding context (e.g., name of competition, annual meeting, research grant) for traceability and provenance.
usage_guideline.constraints: Record exactly one context per award; use controlled vocabulary or descriptive text.

data_properties.name: hasMembershipPeriod
data_properties.description: Specifies the temporal period during which a group or network membership was valid or active for a given person.

usage_guideline.description: Indicate start and end dates, or relevant period, for each GroupMembership instance (ISO 8601 format or equivalent).
usage_guideline.constraints: Each GroupMembership instance should have one period; leave blank if unknown.

data_properties.name: birthDate
data_properties.description: Specifies the date on which a person was born.

usage_guideline.description: Use this property to record the specific birth date of a person where available.
usage_guideline.constraints: One value per person; use ISO 8601 date format (YYYY-MM-DD) for consistency.
